snippet: American and Canadian women have a great respect for one another, but the hockey rivals relish the opportunity to mix it up, though women’s hockey prohibits body checking.
abstract: Jere Longman On Hockey column observes that American and Canadian women's hockey teams have great respect for one another, but the rivals relish the opportunity to mix it up, though women's hockey prohibits body checking; notes that one team or the other has won every Olympic gold medal and world championship awarded in women's hockey, and expectations are high for 2014 Sochi Olympics.
lead_paragraph: American and Canadian women have a great respect for one another, but the hockey rivals relish the opportunity to mix it up, though women’s hockey prohibits body checking.

headline.main: Border War Brewing for the Olympics
headline.print_headline: Border War Brewing For the Olympics
